tgt_original: ya eva hi śabde jñāne pratibhāsate sa eva śabdārtho yuktaḥ,
tena tadevārthapratibimbakaṃ śābde jñāne sākṣāt tadātmatayā pratibhāsanācchābdo'rtho yukto nānya iti bhāvaḥ |
yaścāpi śabdasyārthena saha vācyavācakabhāvalakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandhaḥ prasiddho nāsau kāryakāraṇabhāvādanyo'tratiṣṭhate;
tat adhyavasitabahirbhāvalakṣaṇaṃ rūpaṃ svabhāvo yasya tattathoktam,
tadrūpaṃ ca tat pratibimbaṃ ceti samāsaḥ |
